Package models

Class Inventory

java.lang.Object
models.Inventory
public class Inventory extends Object
Represents the inventory of a medicine in the healthcare system. This class contains information about the medicine's stock levels, alert thresholds, and replenishment status.

  • Constructor Details

    • Inventory

      public Inventory(String medicineName, int currentStock, int lowLevelAlert, ReplenishmentStatus replenishmentStatus)
      Constructs an Inventory object with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      medicineName - The name of the medicine.
      currentStock - The current stock level of the medicine.
      lowLevelAlert - The stock level that triggers a low stock alert.
      replenishmentStatus - The current status of the replenishment request.
